title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, and data flow. Consider the following aspects: 1) Modular design for scalability and maintainability, 2) Secure data handling and storage, including encryption and access controls, 3) High availability and fault tolerance, with redundancy and failover mechanisms, 4) Performance optimization for real-time biometric processing, including load balancing and caching strategies, 5) Integration with existing banking systems, using secure APIs and data exchange protocols, 6) Compliance with relevant security and privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, PCI-DSS), including data protection measures and audit trails.

title: Biometric Authentication Module Design
description: Design the biometric authentication module, including fingerprint, facial recognition, and behavioral biometrics.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema for storing user data, biometric data, authentication logs, and related metadata. Consider data encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA, PCI-DSS). Ensure scalability, high availability, performance optimization for handling large volumes of data and concurrent requests, and data partitioning/sharding strategies. Define data retention policies and archiving/purging mechanisms. Incorporate audit logging and monitoring capabilities.

title: Security and Compliance Review
description: Review security requirements, compliance standards, and data privacy regulations.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for the biometric authentication system.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend services, including biometric authentication, database integration, and security features.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate frontend and backend components, and perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and security testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment environment, configure infrastructure, and automate the deployment process.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Prepare technical documentation, user guides, and training materials.
